input_shelf_ground_stone_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

input_corner_ground_stone_recipe.description: A versatile container for any resource, to help keep crafters supplied.
input_corner_ground_stone_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

input_table_ground_stone_recipe.description: A versatile container for any resource, to help keep crafters supplied.
input_table_ground_stone_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

sign_mason_recipe.description: A heavy stone sign, to be displayed outside a mason's workshop
sign_mason_recipe.flavor: Probably wouldn't even swing in a hurricane

statue_rabbit_flat_recipe.flavor: It's considered lucky to stack a vegetable from each harvest on these statues' backs - lucky for the real rabbits, anyway.

statue_rabbit_recipe.flavor: Just like the huge stone guardian rabbits, except wee.

fountain_tiered_recipe.flavor: It's fun to watch leaves race down the falls. It's less fun to scoop them all out later.

fountain_recipe.flavor: Tastefully tiered, and remarkably free of algae

fountain_garden_recipe.description: A tiny, floating garden for a quiet corner
fountain_garden_recipe.flavor: To be small enough to hide away in its blossoms for an afternoon...

door_mason_recipe.description: Fit for a master mason's workshop
door_mason_recipe.flavor: Feels like knocking on a mountainside

fountain_wishing_recipe.flavor: The exact rate of exchange has never been clear, but who cares it's fun

statue_knight_recipe.flavor:
"...Now quietly the land they keep
amid the brightbells echoing."

statue_knight_male_recipe.flavor:
"Holding back the darkness deep;
shaking iron, steel blades ring..."

portcullis_valor_recipe.description: For times when only the strongest door will do.
portcullis_valor_recipe.flavor: Stone for strength, Iron for versatility, Coal to paint fear into our enemy's hearts.

valor_window_arrow_short_recipe.description: For those who enjoy small compressed views.

valor_window_arrow_tall_recipe.description: For those who enjoy small compressed views.

valor_window_frame_barred_recipe.description: For those who enjoy safe viewing from behind bars.

valor_window_frame_xlarge_recipe.description: For those who enjoy wide expansive views.
valor_window_frame_xlarge_recipe.flavor: I'm not the sort of person who'd tell you what to do with your window, but when Riley stuck it on the first floor like a door, rabbits poured straight into his kitchen. -- Andie, Berry Farmer

valor_brazier_large_recipe.description: A beacon of light to protect your town.
valor_brazier_large_recipe.flavor: From a tall mountaintop, you can see fires like these all across the Darkmoor.

lucid_gem_recipe.description: A spiritual focus, essential for the Shining Circlet
lucid_gem_recipe.flavor: What mysteries hide inside its tranquil blue eye?

giants_shield_recipe.flavor: Against even the most terrible foes and impossible dangers, this shield will never break.

titan_ward_stone_recipe.description: Hurts anything nearby that smells like titan.
titan_ward_stone_recipe.flavor: Baby don't hurt me! Don't hurt me no more!

cobblestone_fence_end_recipe.flavor: Use the earth itself to form the walls of the pasture? Genius!

cobblestone_fence_bar_single_recipe.flavor: Use the earth itself to form the walls of the pasture? Genius!

cobblestone_fence_bar_double_recipe.flavor: Use the earth itself to form the walls of the pasture? Genius!

stone_bed_recipe.description: A bed to call your own after a hard day's work
stone_bed_recipe.flavor: The decorative frame might distract you from the discomfort of sleeping on hard stone

stone_window_frame_wide_wood_recipe.recipe_name: Wide Wood and Stone Window Frame

stone_window_frame_wood_recipe.flavor: Is this what they call a cross section?

stone_window_frame_tall_recipe.description: Extra height adds an air of elegance.

stone_lantern_simple_recipe.description: Nothing fancy. Attach to any wall.
stone_lantern_simple_recipe.flavor: Cons: Heavy. Pros: Unlikely to burn itself down.

stone_garden_lantern_simple_recipe.description: It has a classic handle...mostly for decoration.
stone_garden_lantern_simple_recipe.flavor: It's weight makes it useless to carrying around.

stone_torch_recipe.description: A wall-mounted torch with slowly burning oil.
stone_torch_recipe.flavor: Makes it much easier to burn the midnight oil.

stone_candle_holder_recipe.flavor: Romantic for some, annoying to read by for others.

stone_door_2_recipe.flavor: This here pattern, I learned from the Squarefolk.

stone_double_door_recipe.description: Two doors are better than one.
stone_double_door_recipe.flavor: Some people want to make an entrance... every day.

stone_window_frame_crossbeam_recipe.flavor: Is this what they call a cross section?

cobblestone_fence_combo_recipe.flavor: Use the earth itself to form the walls of the pasture? Genius!

stone_floor_candle_holder_recipe.flavor: Romantic for some, spookily haunted for others.

golem_parts_recipe.description: Used by the Geomancer to craft golems
golem_parts_recipe.flavor: Sturdy enough to hold an ox.

window_box_violet_recipe.description: A planter box full of Violet flowers, built to be placed below window frames.
window_box_violet_recipe.flavor: The capstone of a civilized dwelling.

market_shelf_tall_ground_stone.description: Other players and Travellers can buy goods stocked on these shelves.
market_shelf_tall_ground_stone.flavor: One Hearthling's trash is another's treasure... right?

potter_description.description: Makes useful goods from clay. Upgradeable to the Mason

workshop.name: Potter's Wheel
workshop.long_description: The Potter crafts useful goods and decorative items from clay.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: When inspiration strikes, the Potter may now craft an especially Fine quality of item.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Potter can now create items of Excellent quality, and will make Fine quality items more often.

level_6_data.title: Oleiro (Mestre)
level_6_data.perk_000_description: The Potter has rediscovered ancient secrets of the Phoenix...

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Potter can now make decorative items to liven up the town or sell for money.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: The Potter can now add precious metals to vases and tiles.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The Potter can now make basic furniture and building adornments.

small_urn_recipe.description: For compactly storing up to 8 items
small_urn_recipe.flavor: Mischevious kids break these pots all the time, looking for treasure.

large_urn_recipe.description: For compactly storing up to 32 items
large_urn_recipe.flavor: Once we put things in, how will we get them out? Don't think about it too much

clay_lamp_recipe.description: Its flame brings a warm glow at night.
clay_lamp_recipe.flavor: And the Djinni said to Rayya: 'I have but one last wish to grant. Word it well.'

clay_wall_lamp_recipe.description: Its flame brings a warm glow at night.
clay_wall_lamp_recipe.flavor: 'Close round us guard the spirits of night! As they dance and sway, free you'll be to dream the dark away.'

potter_workbench_recipe.description: Helps the potter create simple items from clay
potter_workbench_recipe.flavor: Where we've been before, we'll be again, round once more, for strength and then--

potter_kiln_recipe.flavor: 'Through heat and hardship we realize our final selves.' -Silora, Acolyte of Rayya's Mystery

clay_safety_standard_recipe.description: Use to designate a safety point
clay_safety_standard_recipe.flavor: To achieve an ideal standard of living, find safety in numbers. --Mysteries and Proverbs, V

clay_bricks_recipe.description: A stack of bricks, used to make clay structures.
clay_bricks_recipe.flavor: 'And when Clay emerged from the Kiln, he had become Brick, and no matter how hard Sun blasted him, he remained cheerful.'

red_clay_door_recipe.flavor: "The red hints at a mystery, allure. What lies beyond yon red door?" -- Ember Iskender, Dept of Applied Poetry

red_clay_window_frame_recipe.flavor: "Industry standard for a reason" -- Jorya Iskender, Dyemaster

blue_clay_door_recipe.description: Blue like the dream of distant ocean.
blue_clay_door_recipe.flavor: 'It's a door. What more could we possibly say?' --Joni Iskender, Marketing Apprentice

green_clay_door_recipe.description: Green, like the few scrub in the desert.
green_clay_door_recipe.flavor: 'Can you make the hole a bit smaller? The point is to see who it is without giving away that I'm home.' --Vara Tenter, Irate Customer

blue_clay_window_frame_recipe.description: Lets in the bright desert air.
blue_clay_window_frame_recipe.flavor: The dye is named Santori, for an acolyte who longed for the ocean.

green_clay_window_frame_recipe.description: Let's in the soft desert air.
green_clay_window_frame_recipe.flavor: It's a window's dream of spring...

latticed_clay_window_frame_recipe.description: The lattice still lets the good air in.
latticed_clay_window_frame_recipe.flavor: As the shadows move across the floor, child, see if you can find Monkey!

clay_bed_recipe.description: Uncomfortable, but it gets you off the ground
clay_bed_recipe.flavor: "It's like a pot, for sleeping!" - Clarence, Temporary Salesperson

clay_dining_table_recipe.description: Gets your food off the ground!

simple_clay_chair_recipe.flavor: 'Nests with the tables, ooo, symbolic!' --Nestor Adya, Acolyte

decorative_teapot_recipe.flavor: 'Wherever she went, the teapot did too, and even when there was nothing but cold water to put in, always out poured steaming tea, redolent with the aroma of Elsewhere.'

decorative_tray_recipe.flavor: 'Sugar, spice, and blood of the earth: it is the tray that brings them, and us, together' --Rayya

potted_cactus_recipe.description: Plant a cactus in a clay pot.

blown_glass_vase_recipe.flavor: They say Monkey had one eye made of glass, and through it, he could see straight to the heart of things. --Master Orlen

decorative_vase_recipe.flavor: It is the riches of the earth reborn

sundial_recipe.flavor: The secret to immortality is to make best of days last forever --Rayya

tile_floor_mosaic_recipe.flavor: Step over the painted flowers, and give thanks

golden_clay_wall_planter_recipe.flavor: Where do the flowers come from? From the planter, of course! --Acolyte of Rayya's Mystery

unfired_clay_vase_recipe.description: A simple vase made on the pottery wheel that is used for more complex recipes.
unfired_clay_vase_recipe.flavor: 'The First Pot was formed together by wind, earth, and fire, connecting the people to Hearth' --Master Orlen

clay_pile_recipe.description: A pile of clay stacked together. An excellent way to store lots of clay for later use.
clay_pile_recipe.flavor: Amazing, honestly, that it comes apart again.

clay_market_stall_recipe.description: Merchants can visit this stall to buy and sell goods
clay_market_stall_recipe.flavor: 'Cut off his hand? For theft? What would be the point?' --Talidor Roq, Knight of Mysteries

clay_tunnel_door_recipe.description: Useful for sealing off mine tunnels.
clay_tunnel_door_recipe.flavor: Speak friend and enter.... oh no wait it's not locked. - Eber, Potter's Apprentice

tan_latticed_window_recipe.description: The latticed window you know and love, in tan
tan_latticed_window_recipe.flavor: "Lets in the bugs, but at least not the really big ones!" -- Drenkar Iskender, Ex-Marketing Associate

tall_clay_window_recipe.description: Still lets in the soft desert air
tall_clay_window_recipe.flavor: "Windowsill can cool a really tall pie" -Aaryn, Pragmatist

tan_clay_window_frame_recipe.flavor: "No, I didn't forget the dye." -Isfan Dorret, Inventor of Achromatism

green_latticed_window_recipe.flavor: Reminicent of a vine-covered treehouse window, faded into memory
green_latticed_window_recipe.description: The latticed window you know and love, now in green!

blue_latticed_window_recipe.flavor: "No but really, where is this dye coming from?" -- Farah, Professional Bugcatcher

wooden_sign_potter_recipe.flavor: Less fragile and easier than hanging a real pot!

output_box_clay_recipe.flavor: Crafters love to show off their work!

input_bin_clay_recipe.flavor: Think of what we can achieve when Hearthlings work together!

titan_ward_clay_recipe.description: Hurts anything nearby that smells like titan.
titan_ward_clay_recipe.flavor: Baby don't hurt me! Don't hurt me no more!

golem_parts_recipe.description: Used by the Geomancer to craft golems
golem_parts_recipe.flavor: Sturdy enough to hold an ox.

clay_fence_gate_recipe.flavor: This decorative gate protects your fences from being broken.

market_shelf_tall_ground_clay.description: Other players and Travellers can buy goods stocked on these shelves.
market_shelf_tall_ground_clay.flavor: One Hearthling's trash is another's treasure... right?

potter_kiln_ghost.description: Produces bricks and goods from clay.

potter_cutter.description: Used to form civilization from dirt!

potter_cutter_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Potter.

potter_outfit.description: Earth splotches are part of its intense style.

shepherd_description.description: Domesticates wild animals and harvests them for food and materials.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: Wild animals are more likely to appear whenever the shepherd is looking for them.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The shepherd is now more adept at getting the flock to walk a tiny bit faster.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The shepherd finds comfort in long walks and feeding the animals, making them less likely to stop and converse.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: The shepherd's skill produces greater yields in animal products.

shepherd_crook_iconic.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Shepherd.

shepherd_crook_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Shepherd.

shepherd_pasture.description: Shepherds bring animals to these locations and tend to them here.

trapper_description.description: The Trapper's snares capture and (ahem) "harvest" small critters for a reliable source of food and supplies.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: Long walks have increased the trapper's foot speed.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: Long practice helps the trapper salvage more from each animal.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The trapper will occasionally choose to turn a particularly fine animal into a pet!
level_2_data.perk_001_description: The trapper now qualifies for advanced jobs. Click the promote command for details.

level_6_data.title: Caçador (Mestre)
level_6_data.perk_000_description: Lay special trapping zones to 'deter' acquisitive neighbors.

level_5_data.perk_000_description: Better trap arming skills increase the trapper's chance for capturing prey by 25%.

level_4_data.perk_000_description: The trapper has become more efficient at packing in the loot.
level_4_data.perk_001_description: When downed, the trapper keeps themselves alive much longer while waiting for rescue

speed_1_buff.description: Long walks have increased the trapper's foot speed.

survivalist_1_buff.description: The trapper can stay downed for much longer than most before giving up the ghost.

trapper_knife_talisman.description: Required to promote a hearthling into a Trapper.

trapping_grounds.description: Trappers catch critters for food and resources in this zone.

weaver_description.description: The Weaver makes thread, fabrics and hangings from fiber and dye.

level_2_data.perk_000_description: The Weaver is now skillful enough to use materials created by other crafters.

level_1_data.perk_000_description: The Weaver can now make basic hangings and decor.

level_3_data.perk_000_description: When inspiration strikes, the Weaver may now craft an especially Fine quality of item. (Not implemented for clothing yet!)

level_5_data.perk_000_description: The Weaver can now create items of Excellent quality, and will make Fine quality items more often. (Not implemented for clothing yet!)

amberstone_chair_recipe.description: Woven in the style of clan Amberstone
amberstone_chair_recipe.flavor: Designed especially to keep fluffy bunny tails off of cold, stone floors

amberstone_chest_recipe.flavor: A tidy space is a happy space!

amberstone_mat_recipe.description: Woven with the skill of the rabbits
amberstone_mat_recipe.flavor: The style of weave requires deep concentration and quick, quick little paws

amberstone_painting_branch_recipe.description: Depicts a tree from cycles past
amberstone_painting_branch_recipe.flavor: What they could not bring with them into exile, the rabbits found ways to preserve

banner_wall_big_recipe.description: Show your town pride with this decorative banner.

banner_wall_small_recipe.description: Show your town pride with this small banner.

bolt_of_cloth_recipe.description: Used to create more comfortable furniture.
bolt_of_cloth_recipe.flavor: To make thicker by the width of one string: add string. Repeat 1,000,000 times.

cloth_bolt_recipe.description: Used to create more comfortable furniture.
cloth_bolt_recipe.flavor: To make thicker by the width of one string: add string. Repeat 1,000,000 times.

cloth_padded_vest_recipe.description: This triple-quilted vest provides more protection to your combat units than mere clothing. Not a lot more, but every little bit helps, right?

curtains_recipe.description: Dresses up an otherwise ordinary window.

fur_rug_recipe.description: A warm and cozy rug, sewn from various animal pelts.
fur_rug_recipe.flavor: Perfect for an evening by the fire.

leather_bolt_recipe.description: Prepared sheets of leather, ready to be put to good use.
leather_bolt_recipe.flavor: You can hardly see the individual sources.

leather_vest_recipe.description: Hardened leather provides study protection against light weapons.

plushie_toy_rabbit_recipe.description: A toy... for children of course.

spool_of_thread_recipe.description: Needed for cloth. Warm and fluffy
spool_of_thread_recipe.flavor: Each gram of fiber yearns to become a sweater.

tapestry_wall_recipe.description: A decorative scene, woven in colored thread and cord.
tapestry_wall_recipe.flavor: What you see in its knotted depths tells you something about yourself.

thread_recipe.description: Needed for cloth. Warm and fluffy
thread_recipe.flavor: Each gram of fiber yearns to become a sweater.

throw_rug_recipe.description: Brightens up that old dusty floor.

worker_outfit_2_recipe.description: Double stitching and strategically placed padding improves the worker's efficiency. The worker who dons this upgrade outfit will move faster.

weaver_loom_recipe.description: Add thread to thread till cloth results.
weaver_loom_recipe.flavor: Patient Spider, weaver, writer, draws the tapestry of fate tighter. --Rayya's Rhyme

weaver_spinning_wheel_recipe.description: Spins prickly, scratchy, chaos into thread.
weaver_spinning_wheel_recipe.flavor: Spider smiles; all eight eyes glitter, 'Something from nothing, some sweet and some bitter.'

weaver_workbench_recipe.description: Used to make complex crafts of thread and fabric.
weaver_workbench_recipe.flavor: In the beginning there was nothing, and then there was Spider.

simple_quiver_recipe.description: A quiver equippable by an archer. Stores freezing arrows that will slow enemies

fire_quiver_recipe.description: Gives an Archer access to fire arrows, which deal damage over time

cloth_padded_helmet_recipe.flavor: Were they phoenix wings, or serpent wings?

input_bin_amberstone_recipe.flavor: Would-be masons of clan amberstone must practice discerning quality stone for many years before they are allowed near a chisel. Many never are.

worker_outfit_2_iconic.description: Construção robusta aumenta a produtividade dos trabalhadores

step001.title: Clique no botão de Zona
step001.description: As zonas definem o que acontece em sua cidade

step003.title: Clique em confirmar
step003.description: ultilize o filtro para selecionar o tipo de item que deseja colocar no estoque

step002.title: Clique no botão Estoque para criar um
step002.description: São os cidadões que colocam seus itens no estoque

scenario_data.message: Se pretende criar sua cidade, precisaremos de madeira... Muita madeira! Corte algumas árvores na proximidade para conseguir madeira.
scenario_data.completed_message: Parabéns! Agora temos alguns recursos. Madeira e outros recursos naturais podem ser usados para construir edifícios e itens artesanais. Eles são essenciais para a construção e avanço da sua cidade.
scenario_data.title: Cidade [str(i18n_data.town_name)] : Suprimentos Iniciais

step001.title: Clique no botão de Colher
step001.description: Use o botão de colheita para cortar as árvores

step000.title: Clique no botão de Cultivar
step000.description: Use o botão de cultivar para coletar recursos do mundo

step006.title: Clique em Decretar para aprovar a promoção

step005.title: Clique no botão de classe do carpinteiro.

step004.title: Clique em Alterar Emprego para promover este Cidadão para um trabalho diferente

step001.title: Abra o Gerenciador de Cidadãos
step001.description: Use este painel para gerenciar todos os seus cidadãos, ver suas estatísticas e definir suas ordens de tarefas.

step000.title: Promova um Cidadão para um carpinteiro
step000.description: Temos troncos e um lugar para guardar mercadorias, mas a cidade parece bem vazia. Felizmente, trouxemos uma serra junto conosco. Vamos promover um cidadão para um carpinteiro!

step007.title: Artesãos da Cidade
step007.description: Carpinteiros e outros artesões podem criar vários produtos para ajudar o seu assentamento, desde camas, materiais de construção e até armas.

step003.title: Passe o mouse sobre os números para saber o que cada atributo faz
step003.description: Cada Cidadão tem um atributo de Mente, Corpo e Espírito que afeta no quão bom eles fazem certas coisas.
